hero.title: Dominate Search
hero.description: Traditional SEO meets the future. We optimize your visibility across Google, ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, and every AI platform that matters. Data-driven strategies that deliver measurable results.

services.title: Search Engine Optimization
services.description: Comprehensive SEO strategies that drive organic growth. From technical audits to content optimization, we cover every aspect of search visibility to help you rank higher and convert more.

services.title: Answer Engine Optimization
services.description: Be the answer, not just a result. Optimize your content to be featured in AI-generated answers from ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google AI Overviews, and more.

services.title: Generative Engine Optimization
services.description: Ensure your brand is cited and recommended by AI systems like ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and emerging LLMs. Future-proof your digital presence.

services.title: Video Production
services.description: Professional video production that transforms raw footage into compelling content. From concept to final cut, we handle everything.

whyUs.title: SEO Experts Since 2018
whyUs.description: Over 6 years of experience optimizing websites for search engines. We've helped 500+ businesses achieve page 1 rankings.

whyUs.title: AI-First Approach
whyUs.description: We optimize for ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, Gemini, and every emerging AI platform before your competitors do.

whyUs.title: Data-Driven Results
whyUs.description: Every strategy is backed by analytics. Monthly reports show exactly what we did and the measurable impact it made.

whyUs.title: Dedicated SEO Team
whyUs.description: Work directly with senior SEO strategists who understand your business, not junior account managers reading scripts.

whyUs.title: Transparent Pricing
whyUs.description: No hidden fees, no long-term contracts, no surprises. Clear pricing with deliverables spelled out upfront.

whyUs.title: Rapid Results
whyUs.description: We move fast. Most clients see measurable improvements within the first 30 days of working with us.

testimonials.text: Apis Digitech transformed our SEO strategy completely. Within 4 months, we went from page 5 to page 1 for our main keywords. Our organic traffic increased by 340% and leads doubled.
testimonials.author: Sarah Mitchell

testimonials.text: Their SEO expertise combined with AEO knowledge is unmatched. We now appear in AI-generated answers across multiple platforms. The ROI has been incredible - 5x return on investment.
testimonials.author: Marcus Chen

testimonials.text: Best SEO agency we've worked with. They delivered exactly what they promised - more traffic, better rankings, and most importantly, more conversions. Highly recommend their services.
testimonials.author: Jennifer Adams

footer.description: Expert SEO services to dominate search rankings. From traditional SEO to cutting-edge AI optimization, we help businesses grow their organic traffic and visibility.
